RegisterRequest.title: User Registration Request
RegisterRequest.description: Schema for the user registration request

user_type.description: The type of the user (doctor, patient, or lab)

address_line_1.description: The user's primary address line (required for doctors and labs)

city.description: The city of the user's address (required for doctors and labs)

state.description: The state of the user's address (required for doctors and labs)

country.description: The country of the user's address (required for doctors and labs)

postal_code.description: The postal code of the user's address (required for doctors and labs)

contact_phone.description: The phone number of the doctor (required for doctor users)

doctor_email_address.description: The doctor's email address (required for doctor users)

name.description: The name of the lab (required for lab users)

reports.description: Array of UUIDs of reports (required for lab users)
